lead_paragraph: The trial of the man, Duane Buck, was marred by testimony from an expert witness presented by the defense that black men are more dangerous than others.

headline.print_headline: Justices Seem Ready to Find Bias in Trial of Black Man
headline.main: Justices Seem Ready to Find Bias in Trial of Black Man on Texas Death Row

snippet: The trial of the man, Duane Buck, was marred by testimony from an expert witness presented by the defense that black men are more dangerous than others....
abstract: Supreme Court rules favorably for Texas death row inmate Duane Buck, agreeing defense team's expert witness testimony in sentencing phase of capital case was unacceptable; Buck's defense team had allowed expert witness to claim Buck was more likely to commit violent acts because he is black; justices will now address question of final remedy in case.
